name: Dorette
description:
Dorette 

(made during the Extra Credit 72H 2020 Game Jam) 

Dorette is a fastpaced speedrunnable FPS game, named after the chicken that take cares of her eggs. And herself !

Learn to master the mechanics, beat up foxes, get eggs and have fun !

Join me on twitter if you have anything to tell me ! :) 

https://twitter.com/TPreudhomme

If you liked the music, here it is : https://soundcloud.com/japsprod/dorette

And check out my other musics ! :)
